info.title: EMM Restful API
info.description:
This is the EMM Restful API.

Authorization is done via username and password as URL parameters or via Basic Auth (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_access_authentication).
Use username and password of an EMM GUI user with permission "utilize the RESTful interface".

Example for request via wget with URL parameters:
wget -S -O - --content-on-error "https://<emm_system_url>/restful/mailing/1?username=<UrlencodedUserName>&password=<UrlencodedPassword>" > test.txt; cat test.txt

Example for request via wget with BASIC AUTH:
wget -S -O - --content-on-error --auth-no-challenge --http-user="<UrlencodedUserName>" --http-password="<UrlencodedPassword>" "https://<emm_system_url>/restful/mailing/1" > test.txt; cat test.txt

tags.description: Everything about references (Not included in OpenEMM)

tags.description: Everything about usergroups used by GUI users and Restful users

get.summary: Get a list of all existing mailings

400.description: Any client side error like invalid mailing id or not existing mailing

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

post.description: Write new mailing data. Does not update existing mailing objects.

requestBody.description: Mailing data to add This is the complete EMM mailing JSON object

200.description: Basic mailing information of created mailing

400.description: Any client side error like invalid mailing id or not existing mailing

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

parameters.description: Optional: Subscription status of recipient. (Active(1), Bounce(2), AdminOut(3), UserOut(4), WaitForConfirm(5), Blacklisted(6), Suspend(7)), needs parameter mailinglist, default active

parameters.description: Optional: Mediatype of subscription: EMAIL (0), POST (2), SMS (2)

parameters.name: mailing_id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the mailing to send

send_type.description: Type of recipients used for this send action. (WORLD("W"), TEST("T"), ADMIN("A"), DATE_BASED("R", send_date on hour base only), ACTION_BASED("E", immediate delivery start, send_date ignored))

user_status.description: Optional customer status, only if user is waiting for confirm (DOI)

data.description: Optional profile data to override in ACTION_BASED mailing

400.description: Any client side error like invalid id or not existing item

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

parameters.name: mailing_id

user_status.description: Optional customer status, only if user is waiting for confirm (DOI)

data.description: Optional profile data to override in ACTION_BASED mailing

400.description: Any client side error like invalid id or not existing item

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

put.summary: Send an exiting actionbased mailing with dynamic content (templateMailingID, sendMailingID)

parameters.name: dynamicContentMailingSchemaName
parameters.description: Name of the existing json schema in EMM

content.description: Binary content zipped and coded in base64

Definition of target in EQL syntax

recipients.description: Array of recipients data. By default only customer_id values are listed. You may use optional additional request parameter "?fields=customer_id,email, ..." or "?fields=*".

type.description: Datatype of this profilefield like Characters, Date, Datetime, Integer, Float, Blob

nullable.description: Optional nullable of this profilefield (Default true)

historized.description: Optional historized of this profilefield (Default false)

length.description: Datatype length of this profilefield only for datatype Characters

shortname.example: Optional shortname of profilefield for GUI display purposes

allowedValues.description: Optional list of strings of allowed values

notVisibleUsers.description: Optional list of admin ids of notVisibleUsers

readOnlyUsers.description: Optional list of admin ids of readOnlyUsers

creation_date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

user_type.description: Letter to identify the recipient type. Default is "W". (ALL_RECIPIENTS("E"), ADMIN_RECIPIENT("A"), TEST_RECIPIENT("T"), TEST_VIP_RECIPIENT("t"), NORMAL_RECIPIENT("W"), NORMAL_VIP_RECIPIENT("w"))

user_status.description: Subscription status of recipient. (Active(1), Bounce(2), AdminOut(3), UserOut(4), WaitForConfirm(5), Blacklisted(6), Suspend(7))

user_remark.description: Descriptive text for this binding entry

entry_mailing_id.description: Mailing id which lead to this subscription

exit_mailing_id.description: Mailing id which lead to this unsubscription

creation_date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

change_date.description: Date-time of change (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

action_id.description: Optional action id to be executed after creation oder update of binding item

runActionAsynchronous.description: Optional setting to run action asynchronous

date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

mailinglist_id.description: Numeric ID of the mailinglist to set for this mailing (not to be used simultaneously with mailinglist_shortname)

mailinglist_shortname.description: Name of the mailinglist to set for this mailing (not to be used simultaneously with mailinglist_id)

mailingtype.description: Type of mailing (Default NORMAL, Other values ACTION_BASED, DATE_BASED, FOLLOW_UP, INTERVAL)

target_expression.description: Expression for targetgroups (Single targetgroupID or multiple ids seprated by "&" or "|" getrennt, only single type of operator allowed)

parameters.description: Mailingparameters as JsonArray of JsonObjects

links.description: Mailing Trackable Links as JsonArray of JsonObjects
